title: Exercise File
description: Schema for the exercise guidance seed JSON used by the PWA.

exercise_id.description: Stable, non-human-readable ID. Legacy: ex0001 format. New: 26-character ULID (Crockford Base32).

pt_category.description: High-level PT category for scheduling and grouping.

description.description: Neutral, step-wise description of how to perform the exercise.

primary_muscles.description: Muscles intentionally targeted; used for strong heat-map highlighting.

secondary_muscles.description: Meaningful stabilizers/synergists; may be rendered as lighter heat-map shading.

pattern.description: Base dosage pattern for the exercise, independent of program-specific values.

pattern_modifiers.description: Pattern-level modifiers indicating structural dosage changes (e.g., duration vs reps). Values are flags; actual numbers live in the program layer.

form_parameters_required.description: Form parameters that MUST be specified in the program layer.

added_date.description: Date this exercise definition was added (YYYY-MM-DD), or null if unknown/not tracked.

updated_date.description: Date this exercise definition was last materially updated (YYYY-MM-DD), or null if never.

required.description: Equipment intrinsic to the exercise (cannot be removed without changing exercise definition).

optional.description: Equipment used for comfort or modification.

tags.description: Tag groups for functional grouping, format/position, and visualization/heat-map mapping.

functional.description: Functional group tags (e.g., balance, hip_strength, SIJ_control).

format.description: Execution format tags (e.g., standing, supine, sidelying, seated, dynamic_control, static_hold, single_leg).

heatmap.description: Optional body-region tags used for heat-map visualization.

guidance.description: Guidance broken into external cues, motor cues, compensation warnings, and safety flags.

external_cues.description: Visible or tactile cues (what to look at or contact).

motor_cues.description: How to move; internal and external movement cues.

compensation_warnings.description: Common compensation patterns to watch for and correct.

lifecycle.description: Lifecycle state for this exercise definition.

status.description: Whether this exercise definition is actively used or archived.

effective_start_date.description: Date this exercise definition became active.

effective_end_date.description: Date this exercise definition stopped being active (e.g., archived).
